article_title: Ferguson Protesters Fan Out as Missouri Governor Calls For New Security Funds
article_text:
FERGUSON, Mo.—Nearly 100 locations from utility substations to sports stadiums are under watch this weekend by the Missouri National Guard and state Highway Patrol, Gov. Jay Nixon wrote in a Saturday letter to lawmakers.

His letter was the latest sign Missouri is straining to keep up a massive, round-the-clock security presence in and around this St. Louis suburb of 21,000 after violent riots erupted here earlier in the week.

...

article_summary:
FERGUSON, Mo.—Nearly 100 locations from utility substations to sports stadiums are under watch this weekend by the Missouri National Guard and state Highway Patrol, Gov.
His letter was the latest sign Missouri is straining to keep up a massive, round-the-clock security presence in and around this St. Louis suburb of 21,000 after violent riots erupted here earlier in the week.
Jay Nixon wrote in a Saturday letter to lawmakers.
